svg.text: MDLM Performance on Language Modeling Benchmarks
Key Finding: MDLM achieves 31.4 PPL, closing the gap with GPT-2 (29.0)
Best discrete diffusion LM result • Only 2.4 PPL gap to autoregressive • State-of-the-art for diffusion
✓ Follows similar scaling laws to AR models
Simpler is better. No need for
✓ Simple: just MLM with variable rate
MDLM: The Simplest Effective Discrete Diffusion LM
"Masked Language Modeling with principled, time-varying masking rates"
Paper: "Simple and Effective Masked Diffusion Language Models" (Sahoo et al., 2024)
